task.instruction: Your user id is mei_hernandez_8984. You want to fly from the LaGuardia Airport in New York city to Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport on May 28 (one way). You have to reach airport in between 7:30 PM to 8:15 PM before the actual time departure time of the flight which is 9:00 PM. You want to fly in basic economy and you want to ensure that the overall cost does not exceed more than 150 since you have to pay the remaining teamâ€™s end-of-quarter dinner expenses. You need to select the flight which have the cheapest base fare for the basic economy. You prefer direct flights without any stopover. You have total 2 baggages. You do not want any kind of insurance. You want to use your gift card that ends with 5309492 number to pay. Your birthday is in your user profile so you do not prefer to provide it unless it is being asked and mandatory for the booking.
